item.title: Crysis 2:MAXIMUM FACEPALM
item.dc:creator: Deutscher_Scharfschu
item.description:
i think it needs a massive gameplay overhaul more than anything. In the first one, the gameplay wasn’t all that good. Crysis 2 needs better AI, Weapon coding, Health system and other elements which were severely lacking in the first one.

Read full topic

item.title: Crysis 2:MAXIMUM FACEPALM
item.dc:creator: AI13
item.description:
If the buildings were fully destroyable then it is possible that you could make your own path from one part of it to another, because lets face it, if you are in the city you have to go into a building eventually. Instead of having to find stairs and elevators, you could possibly throw a desk through a wall, and fallow through the hole you make. And with strength mode, you could even blow a hole in the ceiling and jump up to the floor above. Not a very realistic method of travel through a building, but one that sounds fun to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Crysis 2:MAXIMUM FACEPALM
item.dc:creator: Floyd
item.description:
I’m excited, but I wish they’d chosen a place more original than New York - that city’s been cliched to no end, being the setting for virtually every alien invasion, natural disaster, sci-fi epic and drama known to man.

I think games such as Half-Life 2 showed us that there’s a certain appeal and beauty to run-down, anonymous cities that aren’t so popular with tourists. It gives it a more plausible feel to it. Not to say I’m not excited though.

Read full topic

item.title: Crysis 2:MAXIMUM FACEPALM
item.dc:creator: Corrosive
item.description:
eternalness:

And yet despite that, their still making another one, on an new, more visually awesome and computer overheating engine. My rig can currently run crysis at the highest settings @60fps, but i think it’ll require a 5970 to run Crysis 2: U CAN’T RUN MAXIMUM SETTINGS.

FYI I don’t think the new CryEngine 3 will be more demanding than CryEngine 2, it will probably be scaled down to be playable on consoles, which they’ve shown a tech demo for.

Whether that effects the PC verision, I don’t know, but it’s a possibility.

Oh and put your e-penis back in your pants please.

Read full topic

item.title: Crysis 2:MAXIMUM FACEPALM
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
Maxey:

Honestly they could do the best of both worlds for this. Instead of NYC, why not Thailand? Start in the jungle or whatever they got and make your way to Bangkok, which is not small by any means. And it would be a place that is not so overused in games and movies.

But we’ve already had a game of jungle, it’s time for something different. If you want jungle there’s crysis 1.

Read full topic

item.title: Crysis 2:MAXIMUM FACEPALM
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
Sitten_duck:

Was I the only one who liked Crysis? I mean its not my favorite game by any means, but it was fun. There were some bland moments, and certainly some areas that could have been better, but there wasn’t anything that I hate or that really turned me off gameplay wise.

Don’t worry. You’re not alone. I spent hours just finding different paths to do things in that game. And finding new ways to blow up shacks

Edit: nutsack, quit double-posting, asshole.

Read full topic
